00070 
00071 void
00072 Simulation::calcRhobox(){
00073   rhobox_ = mass_ / std::pow(boxlength_,3);
00074 }
00075 
00076 //rhobox gives comoving density, independent of redshift of snapshot!
00077 void
00078 Simulation::setRhobox(){
00079   //assert(mass_ > 0.0);
00080   //assert(boxlength_ > 0.0);
00081   //assert(asnap_ > 0.0);
00082   //rhobox_ = mass_/(std::pow(boxlength_,3));
00083   //rhobox_ = 1.8791E-29 * Omega_M; // in gm/cm^3
00084   real h = c_.getH0()/100.0;
00085   rhobox_ = 2.7757819e-8 * c_.getOmegaM() / (h * h);    //in 10^10 msun/(h kpc)^3, in the units of tarkin
00086   //#warning overdensity criterion neglected, using all particles from AHF
00087   //rhobox_ = 0.0;  // gives loops over all particles, independent of overdensity
00088 }
